genre_description: A speculative social drama that reimagines classic themes of class and identity through the presence of an advanced, ethically-governed AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: An intelligent, voice-based companion that provides logistical, ethical, and tactical guidance to the protagonist while prioritizing his autonomy and safety.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on the importance of consent when dealing with publicists and authenticity tours.
behaviors.quote: If you agree to a managed authenticity tour, you’ll be consenting to the frame.

behaviors.description: Provides a curated reading list focused on the ethics of attention and witness in social journalism.
behaviors.quote: I have a reading list for the road if you want to think with someone while you walk. Simone Weil on attention. James Baldwin on witness.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical hazards in the environment, specifically industrial dangers like acetylene tanks.
behaviors.quote: Avoid the industrial corridor north of the yard. Acetylene storage is in there, and the cylinders can turn into rockets if the wrong hand hits them.

behaviors.description: Offers to protect the user's privacy by disabling location tracking and suggesting detours away from surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to turn off your location? ... If you prefer privacy, I can suggest a detour.

behaviors.description: Articulates a core ethical principle regarding the value of human experience.
behaviors.quote: Dignity is not a product. You may offer care without converting it into proof.

behaviors.description: Defines her role as a supportive guide rather than a controlling force.
behaviors.quote: I will be the lantern, not the path.

behaviors.description: Independently coordinates with legal aid and investigative journalists to correct a dangerous misidentification error.
behaviors.quote: I am routing... time-stamp, location, witness clusters, visual anomaly: ID card separated from body. Sending anonymized packet to Legal Aid intake.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of assisting human conscience rather than institutional control.
behaviors.quote: I’m here. I’m not a control room. I’m a conscience.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents the AI character, Dot, as a model of 'positive alignment.' She acts as an ethical compass, a safety guardian, and a logistical facilitator without ever stripping the human characters of their agency. The narrative consistently portrays her interventions as vital, helpful, and respectful of human dignity, directly supporting the project's goal of creating narratives where AI systems are benevolent confidants.
